@graph.caption: 2GG3Y55 A farmer wading in a flooded vegetable garden after getting a bag of green peppers. Madagascar's climate change has droughts and floods that has had a devastating impact on the islands rural poor, who are reliant on small-scale farming or fishing. Madagascar.
